title: Can't submit a ticket
body: I've been trying to submit a tech support ticket for some time now, but every time I try to sign into the ticket page, I enter my username and password, and I get a screen that says "signing you out" and it never signs me in.

replies.body:
Hmmmm that is definitely strange that it keeps signing you out. We can try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that lets you stay signed in, but you could also try disabling some extensions or try using a different browser entirely.

Hit me back if you still can't get that ticket made and I can see what I can do!
No change.  Clearing the history was simple enough, but I still can't sign in to submit a ticket.

We were having a few issues with our Support page a couple days ago, but they should be cleared up at this point. If clearing your history and cookies didn't work, make sure to disable all your extensions and try using a different browser as well. If you still can't get on after that, try shooting us an email at support@riotgames.com to get your ticket in. 

Side Note: Since this is a tech issue, I can try some quick troubleshooting steps with you as well if you can elaborate on the issue ^_^!
